content.full_text:
Abraham Lincoln to Blair & Rives, 11 January 18481 MessrsBlair & Riveswill greatly oblige me by sending my by the bearer, the volume containing the Debates of the 2ndsession of the 28thCongress; which volume, if sent, I shall be careful to return uninjured, or pay for, at their

option–
paragraphs: Abraham Lincoln to Blair & Rives, 11 January 18481 MessrsBlair & Riveswill greatly oblige me by sending my by the bearer, the volume containing the Debates of the 2ndsession of the 28thCongress; which volume, if sent, I shall be careful to return uninjured, or pay for, at their

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote and signed this letter.

structured_content.text: Abraham Lincoln to Blair & Rives, 11 January 18481

Messrs[Messieurs]Blair & Riveswill greatly oblige me by sending my[me] by the bearer, the volume containing the Debates of the 2ndsession of the 28thCongress; which volume, if sent, I shall be careful to return uninjured, or pay for, at their
               option–
